title: IndicatorBuilder
description: Effortlessly generate indicator calculation script templates using 'IndicatorBuilder'. This web tool reads a CSV file, where each column represents an indicator by including its respective definition codes, and outputs a script template ready to be copied and used in R or Python. You can streamline your data analysis workflow with 'IndicatorBuilder'.
